dataModel.description: Description of the effectiveness of the project. Did it deliver what was intended to be delivered? Did it meet, exceed or fall short of expectations?
dataModel.name: projectEffectiveness

dataModel.description: Description of the impacts of the project. Did it
dataModel.name: projectImpact

dataModel.description: Description of how efficient the project was in terms of cost vs. outcomes, time vs. outcomes, etc.
dataModel.name: projectEfficiency

dataModel.description: Description of the appropriateness of the methodology used for the project. Was it the right methodology? In hindsight, was there a better methodology available that wasn't used for some reason - explain?
dataModel.name: methodologyAnalysis

items.preLabel: Describe the effectiveness of the project and whether it delivered what was intended:
Describe the impact of the project:
Describe the efficiency of the delivery mechanism(s) for the project the project:
Describe the appropriateness of the methodology(s) used.
